#include <iostream>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <utility>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <sstream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long ULL;
typedef long long LL;

#define DEBUG 0
#define INF 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define rep(i,s,n) for(int i=s;i<n;i++)
#define rrep(i,s,e) for(int i=s;i>=e;i--)
#define PII pair<int,int>
#define VI vector<int>
#define d(x) if(DEBUG) cerr << x << endl
#define d_arr(a,n) if(DEBUG){ rep(i,0,n) { cerr << *(a+i) << " "; } cerr << endl;}

int A[1005];
bool present[100005],possible[1005];

void init()
{
  rep(i,0,1005)
    possible[i]=false;
  rep(i,0,100005)
    present[i]=0;
}

int main()
{
  int test,n,k,sum_pos;
  cin >> test;
  while(test--)
  {
  	cin >> n >> k;
    init();
  	rep(i,0,n)
    {
  		cin >> A[i];
      present[A[i]]=1;
    }
    sort(A,A+n);
    possible[0]=true;
    rep(i,0,n)
    {
      rrep(j,1001,0)
      {
        if(possible[j] && j+A[i]<1001)
          possible[j+A[i]]=true;
      }
    }
    if(possible[k])
        cout << "1\n";
      else cout << "0\n";
  }
  return 0;
}
